title: Apple Music Radio - Content Producer. Fixed-Term Contract
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just create products — they create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple and help us leave the world better than we found it! iTunes revolutionised the way that we consume music and entertainment; now, with Apple Music, our customers have instant access to more than 60 million songs, as well as personalised recommendations, inspiring playlists, direct artist access and Apple Music Radio. Truly all the music you love, all in one place.
description: Apple Music Radio is in search of a Content Producer to create high-level content globally for the Apple Music platform. You will work closely with the station EP and Managing Producer to ensure Apple Music Radio’s programming strategy is woven through the high level content created. The Content Producer will work with the station EP and cross functional partners to implement the creative vision for each program. You will be responsible for driving highly cross functional components of the creation and execution on each show - from inception to show launch and beyond. This is a fixed-term contract role for 12 months.
preferred_qualifications: Strong interpersonal skills including the ability to motivate, lead, and inspire the team and talent you work with, Excellent communication, planning and time management and skills to ensure productions run to time, Calm under pressure particularly within a studio environment, Able to work quickly and efficiently without compromising quality, A flexible and understanding approach with talent, guests, contributors and change overall, Strong writing skills for speech and platform
